name: private_send
description: Send privately: transfer compressed (private) SOL to another wallet using ZK Compression. The transfer is private and does not appear as a normal on-chain send. Use when the user says 'send privately', 'send private SOL', or 'send to [contact] privately'. Recipient can be a Solana base58 address or a contact name from the address book (e.g. landlord, Bob).

amount.description: Amount of SOL to send (from private balance)

recipient.description: Recipient: Solana address (base58) or contact name from the address book (e.g. landlord).
